1: Sir, please wake up. We're approaching the next station.
这位客人，醒醒，马上要到站了。
お客さん、起きてください。もうすぐ駅ですよ。
Passenger, please wake up. We're about to arrive at the station.
This guest, wake up, we are about to arrive at the station.
Sir, please wake up. You are almost at the station.
没关系，请不要害怕，您已经安全了。
大丈夫、怖がらないでください。もう安全ですよ。
There's no need to be afraid. You're safe now.
It's okay, please don't be afraid, you are safe.
Don't worry, don't be afraid. You are safe now.
うっ……私一体どうしちゃったの……。
으음…… 나 대체 어떻게 된 거야…….
Ugh... What the hell happened to me...
Well...what the hell is wrong with me ......
Ugh ...... what the hell is wrong with me .......
It seems that your memories have been damaged. How do you feel now?
看来记忆似乎遭到损伤，请问有什么不舒服的地方么？
記憶にダメージを受けているようですね。どこか気分が悪いですか？
기억에 손상을 입은 모양이군요. 어디 몸이 안 좋으신가요?
It seems like you've damaged your memory. Are you feeling alright?
It seems that the memory has been damaged, is there any discomfort?
It seems that your memory is damaged. Are you feeling sick somewhere?
My head hurts. It feels like I might have bumped into something...
头好痛，感觉像是撞到了什么东西……
……頭が痛い。何かに強くぶつけたみたい。
머리가 아파. 무언가에 세게 부딪힌 것 같아.
...My head hurts. Feels like I hit something.
My head hurts, feels like I hit something ......
I have a headache. ...... I think I hit something hard.
Got it. No external injury detected. Presumably you are suffering from neurological disorder, and your symptoms will be recorded for future use.
明白了，身体检查无外部损伤，推测可能为神经创伤，本症状将作为后续观察参考的对象进行记录。
分かりました。体の検査では外傷はありません。おそらく神経に傷を負ったのでしょう。この症状は事後観察の参考対象として記録します。
알겠습니다. 신체 검사에서는 외상은 없습니다. 아마 신경에 손상을 입은 모양이군요. 이 증상은 사후 관찰 참고 대상으로 기록하겠습니다.
Understood. Physical examination shows no trauma. It's likely nerve damage. This symptom will be recorded for future observation.
Understood, no external damage on physical examination, presumed to be possible neurological trauma, this symptom will be recorded as a follow-up observation reference.
Understood. Physical examination shows no trauma. Probably a nerve injury. This symptom will be recorded as a reference for follow-up observation.
I'm the “Guide”, serial number: HM160304012Ein. I'm the conductor of cart 6 of this train as well, responsible for escorting you home.
我是「引路人」，制造批号：HM160304012Ein，本列车6号车厢列车员，负责护送您回家。
私は「案内人」。製造番号：HM160304012Ein、本列車6号車の車掌です。あなたを家に送り届けるところです。
나는 「안내인」입니다. 제조 번호: HM160304012Ein, 본 열차 6호차 차장입니다. 당신을 집으로 데려다 드리는 중입니다.
I am the "Guide", serial number: HM160304012Ein, conductor of Cabin 6 of this train. I am responsible for escorting you home.
I am "Guide", manufacturing lot number: HM160304012Ein, conductor of car 6 of this train, responsible for escorting you home.
I am the "guide". I am the conductor of car 6 of this train, serial number: HM160304012Ein. I am about to send you home.
Further explanation seems necessary. Please provide a word you like to search.
看来需要进行进一步的说明，请提供您需要检索的单词。
もう少し詳しい説明が必要のようですね。必要な検索ワードをおっしゃってください。
좀 더 자세한 설명이 필요한 모양이군요. 필요한 검색 키워드를 말씀해 주세요.
It seems further explanation is needed. Please provide the word you wish to be clarified.
It seems that further clarification is needed, please provide the words you need to search for.
It sounds like you need a more detailed explanation. Please tell us the search terms you need.
I have no idea. Just explain it briefly.
没有什么头绪，请简单说明一下吧。
何も手がかりがない……簡単に説明してくれる？
아무런 단서가 없어…… 간단히 설명해 줄래?
I've got no idea... Could you explain the situation briefly?
2: Today is April 18 2019. 5 years ago, during the third calamity, the world was destroyed in the havoc by the Herrschers. We're now standing on the ruins of Nagazora, the base of human rebels.
现在的时间为2019年4月18日，世界在5年前发生的第三次大崩坏中，因律者的破坏而毁灭。我们现在所处的位置为长空市废墟，目的地是人类反抗军基地。
現在の時間は2019年4月18日。世界は5年前、第3次崩壊の発生中に律者の破壊によって破滅しました。私たちのいる場所は長空市の廃墟で、目的地は人類のレジスタンス基地です。
현재 시간은 2019년 4월 18일. 세계는 5년 전, 제3차 붕괴 발생 중에 율자의 파괴로 인해 멸망했습니다. 우리가 있는 곳은 장공시의 폐허이며, 목적지는 인류의 레지스탕스 기지입니다.

The current date is April 18th, 2019. Five years ago, during the Third Honkai Eruption, the world was sent into ruin by the Herrschers' ravaging. We are in the ruins of Nagazora City, and our destination is the Human Resistance Base.

The time now is April 18, 2019, and the world was destroyed by the destruction of the Rulers during the Third Great Crash that occurred five years ago. Our current location is the ruins of Nagumo City and our destination is the Human Resistance base.

The current time is April 18, 2019. The world was ruined 5 years ago by the destruction of the Rulers during the outbreak of the Third Disintegration. We are in the ruins of the city of Long Sky and our destination is the human resistance base.
The Herrschers initiated a global disaster to obliterate human civilization. At the same time, the explosion of Houkai Energy led to the mass extinction of many species in the world.
由律者为中心引发的全球性大崩坏摧毁了人类文明，与大崩坏同时发生的崩坏能爆炸导致了地表生物的大量灭绝。
律者を中心に世界規模の大崩壊が誘発され、人類文明は破壊されました。大崩壊と同時に発生した崩壊エネルギーの爆発によって、地表の生物はほぼ絶命しています。
율자를 중심으로 세계 규모의 대붕괴가 유발되어, 인류 문명은 파괴되었습니다. 대붕괴와 동시에 발생한 붕괴 에너지의 폭발에 의해, 지표의 생물은 거의 절명했습니다.

The Herrscher triggered a global Eruption, destroying human civilization. The explosion of Honkai Energy that occurred at the same time as the Eruption almost wiped out all living beings off the face of the Earth.

The global cataclysm triggered by the Ruler destroyed human civilization, and the collapse energy explosion that occurred simultaneously with the cataclysm led to the mass extinction of life on the surface.

A global cataclysmic collapse was triggered by the Ruler and human civilization was destroyed. The explosion of disintegrating energy that occurred simultaneously with the Great Collapse has almost exterminated life on the surface of the earth.

Following the global climate abnormality and the influence under the post-explosion of Houkai energy, the Earth was not a place of any organism to live. After the 3-year post-apocalypse, the overall population on earth reduced to 0.00006%. And you are one of the rarest survivors.
在随后并发的全球气候异常及爆炸后残余的崩坏能死斑影响下，地球已经失去了生物存活的条件，在经历了3年的灾难期后，全球人口存活率约为0.00006%，而你就是其中贵重的生存者之一。
その後、発生した世界規模の異常気象と爆発、そして残された崩壊エネルギーの致死的な影響によって、地球は生物生存の条件を失いました。3年の災害期間を経て、地球の人口残存率は約0.00006%です。そして、あなたはその中の貴重な生存者の1人です。
이후 발생한 세계 규모의 이상 기상과 폭발, 그리고 남겨진 붕괴 에너지의 치명적인 영향으로 지구는 생물 생존의 조건을 상실했습니다. 3년의 재난 기간을 거쳐, 지구의 인구 잔존율은 약 0.00006%입니다. 그리고 당신은 그중의 귀중한 생존자 중 한 명입니다.

The subsequent global catastrophe and explosion — along with remnant Honkai Energy creating a Death Spot — caused the Earth to loose its conditions for life to survive. After three years of disaster, the remaining population of the Earth is approximately 0.00006% of its original number. And you are one of the precious survivors.

In the subsequent complications of the global climate anomaly and the impact of the residual collapse of the explosion can die spot, the Earth has lost the conditions of biological survival, after a three-year disaster period, the global population survival rate of about 0.00006%, and you are one of the precious survivors.
After three years of disaster, the Earth's remaining population is about 0.00006%, and you are one of the precious survivors. And you are one of the precious few survivors.

알겠습니다. 그러면 제게 남겨진 파일에 따라 당신의 정보를 대조하겠습니다.

4: Is Houraiji Kyuushou your real name?
请问 蓬莱寺 九霄 是您的名字么？
あなたの名前は蓬莱寺九霄ですか？
Is Penglai Temple, Kyuushou your name?
5: I see. If you have any information that might help you recall your memories, please contact us and we will try our best to help.
明白了，如果您有其他能够回忆起来的信息可以告诉我，我们会尽力帮助找回您的记忆。
分かりました。他に思い出せる情報があれば教えてください。私があなたの記憶を取り戻すお手伝いをします。
알겠습니다. 다른 기억나는 정보가 있으면 알려주세요. 제가 당신의 기억을 되찾는 걸 도와드리겠습니다.
Understood. Please let me know if there's anything else you manage to remember. I will help you recover your memories.
Understood, if you have any other information that you can recall you can let me know and we will try to help retrieve your memories.
Understood. Please let me know if there is any other information you can recall. I will help you retrieve your memories.
Ah! My head hurts so bad! It seems that I might have forgotten something important...
呃！头好痛！总觉得忘记了什么重要的事情……
うぅ！頭が痛い！何か大事なことを忘れている気がする……。
우우! 머리가 아파! 뭔가 중요한 걸 잊어버린 것 같아…….
Ugh! My head hurts! I feel like I've forgotten something important...
Ugh! What a headache! Always feel like I'm forgetting something important ......
Ugh! My head hurts!!! I think I'm forgetting something important. ......
We're almost there. Hold on a little longer.
马上就要到站了，请您再坚持一下。
もうすぐ駅ですから、もうしばらく辛抱してください。
We're almost at the station; please be patient for a little while longer.
We are almost at the station, please hold on a little longer.
The station is almost there, so please be patient for a while longer.
“Warning! This train is being attacked by Houkai creatures. Please remain calm and follow the crew's instruction to evacuate.”
「警报！本列车遭到崩坏生物袭击，请各位乘客保持冷静，遵循列车工作人员进行疏散」
「警報！本列車は崩壊生物の襲撃を受けました。乗客の皆さんは落ち着いて、係員の指示に従って避難してください」
「경보! 본 열차는 붕괴 생물의 습격을 받았습니다. 승객 여러분은 침착하게 승무원의 지시에 따라 대피해 주세요」
"Warning! This train is currently under attack by Honkai Beasts. All passengers, please remain calm and follow the staff's instructions to evacuate."
"Alert! This train is being attacked by avalanche creatures. Please remain calm and follow the train staff to evacuate.
Warning! This train has been attacked by a disintegrating organism. All passengers should remain calm and follow the instructions of the train crew.
What the hell is this thing!
不好了！不好了！这位客人，请往这边撤离。
マズい！マズい！お客さん、こっち側へ避難してください。
큰일이야! 큰일이야! 손님, 이쪽으로 대피해 주세요.
Not good! Not good! Passenger, please evacuate on this side.
It's not good! It's not good! This guest, please evacuate this way.
Yummy! Oh, no! Sir, please evacuate to this side.
Oh my god! Please send help now!
糟糕！糟糕！请求援助，请求援助~
やばい！やばい！救助要請、救助要請～。
위험해! 위험해! 구조 요청, 구조 요청~.
Oh no! Oh no! Requesting assistance, requesting assistance~
Shit! Oh no! Requesting assistance, requesting assistance~
Oh no! Oh no! Call for help, call for help~!
6: Sorry, I was late. Are you hurt?
抱歉抱歉~稍微来迟了一会，你没有受伤吧？
ごめん、ごめん～ちょっと遅れちゃった。ケガしてない？
미안, 미안~ 조금 늦었어. 다친 데 없어?
Sorry, sorry~ I'm a bit late. You hurt?
Sorry for being a little late, but you're not hurt, are you?
Sorry, sorry - I'm a little late. Are you hurt?
Not bad. Killing these zombies is just a piece of cake to you. You're surely worth training.
嚯…干的不错嘛，居然能打倒这么多死士~看来是个值得培养的家伙呢。
わぁ……よくやったね。ゾンビをこんなに倒すなんて～育成のしがいがある子みたい！
와…… 잘했어. 좀비를 이렇게 많이 쓰러뜨리다니~ 키울 가치가 있는 아이 같아!
Wow... you did a great job. Killing so many zombies and all~ You seem like a kid worth training!
I'm sure you'll be able to get a lot of dead soldiers to fight you, but it seems like a guy worth training.
Wow ...... well done. To take down so many zombies ~ sounds like a kid worth nurturing!
7: Looks like you recognize us. That's great, we can skip the introduction.
嚯~看来你知道我们呢，既然这样的话解释起来就方便许多了~
ん～？私たちのことを知っているんだね。そういうことなら話が早いな！
음~? 우리들을 알고 있었구나. 그렇다면 이야기가 빠르겠네!
Hmm~? Seems like you already recognize us. In that case, I'll make this quick!
Ho ~ it seems that you know us, in that case it will be much easier to explain ~
Hmm? You know us, don't you? Well, if that's the case, you're a quick talker!
8: Now you're one of us now.
不不不~不是“你们”，现在你已经成为了“我们”的一员了哦。
ううん「あなたたち」じゃないよ。今日からは「私たち」の一員だよ。
No, it's not "Who are you?" You should be asking "Who are we?" From today onwards you're one of us too.
No no no ~ not "you", now you have become a member of "us" Oh.
No, it's not "you guys. From today on, you're one of "us".

Captain, all the Houkai creatures on the train are eliminated. We're approaching the station.
队长，列车上的崩坏生物已经消灭完毕，已向车站发出入站申请。
隊長、列車の崩壊生物は消滅完了しました。駅に進入申請をしています。
대장, 열차의 붕괴 생물은 소멸 완료했습니다. 역에 진입 신청을 하고 있습니다.
Captain, all the Honkai Beasts on the train have been eliminated. We're requesting to enter the station.
Captain, the collapsed creatures on the train have been eliminated and an entry request has been sent to the station.
Captain, the train's disintegrating organisms have been annihilated. We are applying to enter the station.

speaker
msg
You want to know what I am? Come with me. From now on, you are one of us.
哼，你想知道我们的身份么？那就跟我一起来吧，从现在开始你就是我们的家人了~
ふふ、私たちが何者か知りたい？だったら一緒に来てくれるかな？今日からあなたも私たちの家族だよ！
후후, 우리가 누군지 알고 싶어? 그렇다면 함께 와줄래? 오늘부터 너도 우리의 가족이야!
Hehe, you want to know who we are? In that case, why don't you come with me? From today on, you're part of our family too!
Hm, do you want to know who we are? Then come with me, you're our family from now on~
Hmmm, do you want to know who we are? Then will you come with us? You're our family from this day forward!

soundEffect1
DLC_CH00_EV06_TrainStopAtBase
msg
Welcome home. We are human rebels against the Houkai.
欢迎回家，我们是人类对崩坏反抗军——
私たちは対崩壊レジスタンス。よろしくね。
우리는 대붕괴 레지스탕스. 잘 부탁해.
Welcome home. We're the Resistance, the last of humanity fighting for survival against the Honkai...
Welcome home, we are human beings against the collapse of the resistance -
We are the Anti-Collapse Resistance. Nice to meet you.
10: Here I am, Sister! Mission accomplished!
姐姐大人~我回来了哟！任务顺利完成！
お姉ちゃん～ただいま！無事、任務終了したよ！
Big sis~ I'm back! I've successfully completed my mission!
Sister~ I'm back! Mission successfully completed!
Sis~ I'm home! I finished my mission safely!
お帰りなさい。ケガはしていませんか？
How caring you are. But I will not be harmed in an easy mission like this.
姐姐大人真是爱操心呢，这种小任务我怎么可能会受伤嘛~
ブローニャお姉ちゃんは心配しすぎだよ。こんな任務でケガなんかしないよ～。
브로냐 언니는 너무 걱정이야. 이런 임무에서 다칠 리 없잖아~.
You worry too much, Bronya. No one would get hurt on a mission like this~
Sister really love to worry about it, such a small task how I can be injured ~
You worry too much, sister Bronya. I won't get hurt on a mission like this!
Well, I was asking about my family that escorted you home.
不，我的意思是护送的家人有受伤么？
いえ、護送した家族にケガはありませんでしたか？
아니, 호송한 가족 중에 다친 사람은 없었어요?
No, I meant, is the new family member you escorted home injured?
No, I mean were any of the escort's family members injured?
No. Were any of the families you escorted injured?
No, they are not injured. Here's the information of the survivors.
咕…没有受伤啦！真是的，姐姐大人总是欺负人！给，这是这次所有幸存者的资料~
ぐっ……ケガしてないよ！まったく、お姉ちゃんはいつもイジワルするんだから！ほら、これが今回の生存者の資料だよ～！
흐응...... 다친 거 없어! 정말, 언니는 항상 이렇게 놀리는 거야! 자, 이번 생존자 자료 여기 있어~!
Grk... She's not hurt! You're always so mean to me! Look, here's the info on the survivor this time~!
Goo...I'm not hurt! You're such a bully, Sister! Here, here's the information of all the survivors this time~
Ggghh...... I'm not hurt! God, you always tease me, sis! Here, this is the survivor's file~!
Thank you for your hard work, Seele.
Yes, thank you for your time. Seele.
This man's info is almost empty.
这个人是…资料几乎是空白的。
この人は……資料がほとんど空白ですね。
이 사람은...... 자료가 거의 비어 있네요.
This person... Her information's nearly blank.
This person is...the information is almost blank.
This person has a ...... document that is mostly blank.
The record indicates that she has been traumatized, so she can't remember anything.
这个啊，就是这位。资料上显示记忆受到了创伤，似乎是记不得自己的事情了呢。
それがそうなの。資料には、記憶にダメージを受けて自分のことを覚えていないようだって書いてあるし。
그게 그런 거야. 자료에는, 기억에 데미지를 입어서 자신에 대한 것을 기억하지 못하는 것 같다고 써 있더라.
That's right. The report says there's a problem with her memory and she can't remember anything.
This is the one. The information shows that the memory is traumatized, and it seems that he can't remember anything about himself.
That's what it is. The documents say that he doesn't seem to remember himself because of the damage to his memory.
I'd like to introduce to you my favorite Sister, Bronya Zaychik, leader of the rebels!
我给你介绍一下~这位是我最喜欢的姐姐大人！反抗军的领袖——布洛妮娅·扎伊切克！巴拉巴拉~

앗, 소개할게~ 이쪽은 제가 가장 좋아하는 언니! 레지스탕스의 리더를 맡고 있는 브로냐・자이칙! 짝짝짝~

Call me Bronya. And Bronya is not a leader. She just lives with everyone.

msg

Anyway, let's get back to you. From the record, there's no conspicuous external injury to your body. The loss of memories is likely to be caused by mental stimulation, but we can't rule the possibility of the impact of the Houkai. Therefore, the cause of your suffering is still undetermined.
言归正传，刚才谈到你的情况，从资料来看你身体没有明显的外伤，记忆的创伤很可能是因为精神上的刺激，但也不排除崩坏的影响，因此还不能完全下定论。
話を戻しましょう。ちょうどあなたのことを話していました。資料を見ると外傷はないようです。記憶は精神的なダメージによるものかもしれません。ですが、崩壊の影響も排除できませんので、まだ結論は出せません。
다시 본론으로 돌아가지요. 방금 당신에 대해 이야기하고 있었어요. 자료를 보면 외상은 없는 것 같아요. 기억은 정신적 충격 때문일 수도 있죠. 하지만 붕괴의 영향도 배제할 수 없으니 아직 결론은 내릴 수 없어요.

Let's get back to the topic at hand, when we were talking about you. Looking at the files, there doesn't seem to be any trauma. The memory loss may be due to psychological damage. However, we can't rule out Honkai influence, so we can't draw any conclusions just yet.

To cut to the chase, just talking about your situation, from the information you have no obvious physical trauma, the memory trauma is likely due to mental stimulation, but also does not exclude the impact of collapse, so it is not completely conclusive.

Let's get back to the story. We were just talking about you. The material does not appear to be traumatic. The memory may be due to psychological damage. But we can't rule out the effects of the collapse, so we can't draw any conclusions yet.
msg
But I think the symptom is only temporary. No worries, you'll regain your memories. I'll try my best to help you.
不过我觉得这个症状只是暂时的，记忆一定会再次恢复的，所以你也不用着急，只要慢慢恢复就行了，我会尽自己最大的努力帮助你的。
ですが、この症状は一時的なものだと思います。記憶はきっと蘇るはずです。ですから、あわてないでください。ゆっくり回復すれば大丈夫です。最大限、努力してお手伝いします。
하지만 이 증상은 일시적인 것 같아요. 기억은 분명 되살아날 거예요. 그러니 서두르지 마세요. 천천히 회복하면 괜찮을 거예요. 최대한 노력해서 도와드릴게요.
However, I believe this symptom is only temporary. I'm sure you'll regain your memories. So please don't worry. Just take it easy and you'll be fine. I'll do my best to help you.
But I think this symptom is only temporary, the memory will definitely be restored again, so you do not need to rush, just slowly recover on the line, I will do my best to help you.
But I think this symptom is temporary. The memory will surely come back. So don't panic. Recover slowly and you will be fine. We will do our utmost to help you.

刚才进入基地前你也发现了吧~我们的基地构筑在这座地下车站中，是作为对抗崩坏生物相对安全的据点。
さっき基地に入る前に気づいたと思うんだけど、私たちの基地はこの地下の駅の中にあるの。崩壊生物に対抗するための安全な拠点なんだ～。
아까 기지에 들어가기 전에 눈치챘을 거 같은데, 우리 기지는 이 지하 역 안에 있어요. 붕괴 생물에 대항하기 위한 안전한 거점이죠~
